items.name: Suya Skewers
items.description: Spicy, grilled beef skewers marinated with peanut-based suya spice.

items.name: Nigerian small chops
items.description: A platter of small, bite-sized snacks to munch on before the main meal.

items.name: Jollof rice and raosted fish
items.description: Spice up your lunch menu with this delectable jollof rice and fried fish dish. This jollof rice and fried fish came together very well.

items.name: Pounded yam and egusi soup
items.description: This traditional delicacy combines the smoothness of pounded yam with the rich flavors of Egusi soup, resulting in a delightful culinary experience.

items.name: Strawberry Icecream
items.description: a flavor of ice cream made with strawberry or strawberry flavoring that will melt in your mouth!.

items.name: Fruit Yogurt Parfait
items.description: This yogurt parfait is made by simply layering vanilla yogurt, granola and fruit in a glass. A delicious and beautiful beginning to your day!.
